reviews.review_msg: Didn't really think he knew how to teach much. At times, he was interesting but overall I liked my other classes better. I talked a lot in tutorials but still didn't get much participation. However, the final was pretty easier, better than i thought and I only studied 2 days for it! Wouldn't recommend the class though..hes not the clearest person.

To be honest, I was very upset with this course- I did study,participate and generally understand the material but hings that were emphasized strongly in the course were not on the exam- it consisted mostly of the video clips he provided in September, and the Teacher assistant presentations, not at all from the textbook or his lectures.
agree 100% with below comment. Absolutely hated this class! Class has been over for 3 weeks and she has yet to hand back assignments from November. Would not recommend her to anyone.
It was boring to many reading, I had sick TA though. But you have to memorize everything he says. Not the greatest marker
